name: Psion Attack 2021
description:
Psion Attack 2021

Survive waves of Psion Raiders intent on destroying your home planet of Xargon 2956743. It's just you, your ship and your trusty lasers against the raiders. But don't shoot those space mines!

Extra life every 5000 points.

This game is an entry for the RVG/Phoenixware Cassette 50 charity competition. All code must reside below $1000 in memory. 

This is a remake of Psion Attack on the original version of the Cassette 50 shovelware compilation.

v1.1: Tweaked collision detection. Extra life now every 5,000. More mines!
